name: Hack Attack: Code Corruption (mwclaass)
description:
Clumsy Elephant Studios Presents: Hack Attack: Code Corruption

In this puzzle platformer, you have the ultimate power: to re-write the game’s code in real time. Discover new code blocks to unlock wild abilities and completely overhaul your character’s controller. Hack into your enemies to build an army of killer office supplies and escape from corporate hell!

Credits Development Matthias Claassen (mwclaass@umich.edu)
Jack Busa (jbusa@umich.edu)
Elizabeth Pritchard (lizap@umich.edu)
Robert Sorkin (rsorkin@umich.edu)
Nathan Taylor (nntaylor@umich.edu) Audio Aaron Kofsky (aaronko@umich.edu) Art Matthias Claassen (mwclaass@umich.edu)
Mariana Ortiz Luna (mortluna@umich.edu)
